text: Aloysius Ball (7 December 1873–1940) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Leicester Fosse and Preston North End. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:1940 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Nelson F.C. players
title: Alf Ball (footballer, born 1873)
